hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Megaton Hammer#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Megaton Hammer#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Water Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial First Right Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Hylian Shield# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Recovery Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: Why are you asking me? I don't have any answers! I'm just as confused as you are!

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Lobby Left Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Ice Cavern#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #8# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #the Mirror Shield#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: On second thought, let's not go to Hyrule Castle. 'Tis a silly place.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Third Left Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Hallway Right Invisible Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Shadow Temple Small Key#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Green Potion Bottle#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.
hinted_locations: ZR Near Open Grotto Freestanding PoH

ZF (Jabu).text: Did you know that Ruto is strong enough to defeat enemies and activate ceiling switches inside Jabu Jabu's Belly?

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Kokiri Shop#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
